__e: No, I know that, but now I know that I can have fun, and I feel better about that, much better.
It has to do with wasting my time, laughing and carrying on like nothing is wrong while friends of mine may be out there dying someplace.
I don't trust him, he doesn't trust him, nobody trusts my wife, and when it comes down to it, I just want to have fun and I want to win.
I'm trying to have fun with you, and it's like you don't even want to be here.
You're in here, like, all the time, like, whenever I'm out doing fun things with friends, you're in here, spending time with your room.

When you and me hooked up... it was like, all of a sudden, there was this part of my life where I didn't have to be hiding or fighting or anything else, except... tryin' to make a livin' and kickin' it with my homegirl.
I wonder if I might have a go of it with the leader of this mountain of monkeys?
Just having a bit of fun, to remind me that life's worth living.
I too have a right to get some sleep and have some fun!
I too have a right to get some sleep and have some fun!
I don't want fun,and a person should get what she wants.
Just having a bit of fun, to remind me that life's worth living.
If I can't have any fun, what's the point?
I just hope you don't end up like Jackson, or worse! But I'm not going to stand around and watch it.
I was having fun in I don't even remember what city. When I woke up, I didn't know where I was how I got there, or who the guy was that I was with.
I mean, yeah, I like to have fun sometimes. I'm a damn good doctor.
